```{r, message=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(here)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
# Get directory of repository
base_path = here::here()

# Load pre-written functions
source_path = file.path(base_path, 'code', 'utils',
                        fsep = .Platform$file.sep)
source_files = list.files(source_path, pattern = "[.][rR]$",
                          full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)
invisible(lapply(source_files, function(x) source(x)))
```

```{r}
# Load data
data = Load_model_fits()
```

```{r}
data_plot = data %>%
  data.table::melt(., id.vars = c('participant_id',
                                  'iter',
                                  'task_version',
                                  'name_design_r1',
                                  'name_design_r2',
                                  'para',
                                  'first_status',
                                  'first_ll',
                                  'second_status',
                                  'second_ll'),
                   measure.vars = c('first_x0',
                                    'first_solution',
                                    'second_solution'),
                   value.name = 'val') %>%
  .[, variable := factor(variable, levels = c('first_x0',
                                              'first_solution',
                                              'second_solution'))]

bla = data.table::dcast(data_plot,
                        participant_id + 
                          iter +
                          task_version + 
                          name_design_r1 + 
                          name_design_r2 + 
                          first_status + 
                          first_ll + 
                          second_status + 
                          second_ll + 
                          variable ~ paste0('value_', para), value.var = 'val')

ggplot(data = data_plot,
       aes(x = ))
```
